pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可否认的；可拒绝的；可否定的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 语气较强，强调凭推理或证据驳斥一项主张或言论。
普通用词，侧重否认意见或言论的真实性，尤指否定他人的指控或责难。
指肯定地否认、反对或反驳某事，坚持相反的意见。
普通的广泛用词。指不作争论或不提出论据而无理由地反对；也指任何温和、有理由的反对或否定。
多指由于某物某事某行为不能让人满意而被当面直截了当地拒绝。
指坚决地拒绝接受、给予或承认。
指婉言谢绝他人的帮助或邀请等。
语气较重，指态度坚决，肯定无疑的拒绝。

bilingual.target: 他们否认曾见过那个人。

bilingual.source: She cannot deny her love for music.
bilingual.target: 她无法否认自己对音乐的热爱。
她无法否认所提供的证据。

bilingual.source: They deny any involvement in the crime.
bilingual.target: 他们否认与犯罪有任何牵连。

bilingual.source: His knee-jerk reaction was to deny everything.
bilingual.target: 他的本能反应是否认一切。

bilingual.source: She couldn't deny the fact that she was wrong.
bilingual.target: 她无法否认她错了的事实。

bilingual.source: Nobody can deny the importance of education.
bilingual.target: 没有人能否认教育的重要性。

list.abstract: 《Deny》是韩国演唱男子组合Boyfriend演唱的一首歌曲，收录于2014年6月9日发行的《Obsession》专辑中。

yingyinNormal.en: I do not deny it. How could you do it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我并没有否认这些。你怎么能做出这样的事情？

yingyinNormal.en: My government will officially deny that we're having this conversation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我方政府会正式否认我们有过本次谈话。

yingyinNormal.en: So you were right? I confronted her, and she didn't deny it. I don't live here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你猜对了？我当面问她，她没有否认我不住这里。

yingyinNormal.en: You may try. But you cannot deny the truth that is your family. You're so right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管来，但你不可否认的事实是那是你的家人。你说的太对了。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't deny that, by comparison our internal plumbing is extremely high maintenance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能否认，比较而言，我们的内部下水系统太难伺候了。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you believe him? Do you deny it? For you of all people to talk as if his qualifications don't matter!
yingyinNormal.zh: 您相信他吗？你否认吗？您居然会说得好像他的资质不重要！

yingyinNormal.en: I can neither confirm nor deny details of any such operation without Secretary's approval.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在没有获得部长的许可之前，我既不能承认也不能否认这些行动的细节。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, that is my father in that photograph, I'm not going to deny it. But the truth is he wasn't in the Klan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，照片上的人是我父亲，我不会否认。但事实是他不是三K党的人。

yingyinNormal.en: I can neither confirm nor deny details of any operation, without the Secretary's approval. Yes, we know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我既不能承认也不能否认这些行动的细节…在没有获得部长的许可之前，是的，我们知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you deny it, Mr. Darcy, that you separated a young couple who loved each other, exposing your friend to center of the world for caprice and my sister to its derision for disappointed hopes, and involving them both in misery of the acutest kind?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能否认你拆散了一对相爱的恋人，让你的朋友被大家指责为朝三暮四，让我的姐姐被大家嘲笑为奢望空想，你叫他们俩受尽了痛苦？

yingyinNormal.en: There is nothing I'd deny you, if you would not deny me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我什么都愿意给你，只要你接受我。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, I made a request he did not deny. Uh-huh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，我提了一个他无法拒绝的要求。嗯嗯。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, he knows what's what. Though, he might deny it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他其实都一清二楚，只是不愿意承认。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't deny I'm impressed you got H.M.G. to cough up for all this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你竟能让政府为这一切买单，我对你刮目相看。

yingyinNormal.en: That's how important this is to me. Because it's important to her. Deny it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这件事对我就是这么重要，因为这对她很重要。快否定。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't try to deny it. He's a remarkable man, but you have to let him go. Oh, gee, okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别狡辩了，他是个出色的男人，但你必须放过他。老天爷，没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Get out of there. That's an order. Permission to defy order. Permission denied. Then I deny your denial.
yingyinNormal.zh: 离开那儿！这是命令！允许违抗命令。驳回允许！我驳回你的驳回！

yingyinNormal.en: Leaving your family? Si. But I could not have done it differently. One cannot deny who one is meant to be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 离开家人？对，但如果时光倒流我还是会做出同样的选择，天命难违。

yingyinNormal.en: Tic-tac-toe can only end in win, lose or draw, none of which will deny me closure. Especially since I'm about to win.
yingyinNormal.zh: 井字游戏肯定会有赢，输，或平手的结局，完全没办法阻止我得到结局的乐趣，特别是我即将胜出的情况下。

yingyinNormal.en: Deny it. Riley. Tell me that whoever this Zay kid is, that he can't just come in here and change you from the Lucass we know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快否定。莱丽。快告诉我，不管那个叫小扎的孩子是谁，他不能突然跑来改变我们所认识的那个卢卡斯。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 否认；拒绝；对…否认；否认声明；拒绝承认

word_family.mean: v. 否认；戒绝；拒绝把…给予；拒绝…进入；禁绝

sense_info_list.en: refuse to give or grant something requested or desired to someone

examination_example.sentence: A regulatory structure <highlight>denies</highlight> management the flexibility to adjust its operations to the new reality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 管理结构拒绝给予管理层灵活性，来让运营适用于新的现实。

examination_example.sentence: The charter's main tool of enforcement is to <highlight>deny</highlight> access for designers and modeling agencies to Copenhagen Fashion Week (CFW).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该章程的主要执行手段是拒绝设计师和模特经纪公司参加哥本哈根时装周（CFW）。

sense_info_list.en: state that one refuses to admit the truth or existence of

examination_example.sentence: Glenn Mulcaire may <highlight>deny</highlight> phone hacking as a crime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Glenn Mulcaire可能会否认电话窃听是犯罪行为。

sense_info_list.en: restrain oneself especially from indulgence in pleasures

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 自我否定；忘我；自我牺牲
n. 否认；拒绝；对…否认；否认声明；拒绝承认

word_family.mean: v. 否认；戒绝；拒绝把…给予；拒绝…进入；禁绝

sense_info_list.en: refuse to give or grant something requested or desired to someone

examination_example.sentence: I'm not referring to employees who are legitimately dissatisfied with their employment conditions due to, say, being <highlight>denied</highlight> fair pay or flexible work practices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我指的不是那些因为被拒绝公平薪酬或弹性工作制而对自己的工作条件产生合理不满的员工。

examination_example.sentence: It's time in which we are directed by the needs and desires of others, and <highlight>denied</highlight> the right to make our own choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个时代，我们被他人的需求和欲望所左右，而被剥夺了做出自己选择的权利。

examination_example.sentence: What is the result of <highlight>denying</highlight> worker's right to make their own choices?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拒绝给予工人做出自己选择的权利的结果是什么？

sense_info_list.en: state that one refuses to admit the truth or existence of

examination_example.sentence: In a statement, Burberry <highlight>denied</highlight> that switching to "see now, buy now" has had an impact on waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一份声明中，巴宝莉否认改用“即看即买”对浪费产生了影响。

examination_example.sentence: But there's no <highlight>denying</highlight> ethical leadership is at least a critical step in the right direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但不可否认，有道德的领导至少是朝着正确方向迈出的关键一步。

examination_example.sentence: The prime minister <highlight>denied</highlight> there was a connection between his new adviser's outside interests and the change in legislative programme.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首相否认其新顾问的外部利益与立法计划的变化有关。

examination_example.sentence: By kicking off your shoes before you enter the home, you are <highlight>denying</highlight> entry to these harmful chemicals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进屋前脱掉鞋子，你就拒绝了这些有害化学物质的进入。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指肯定地否认、反对或反驳某事, 坚持相反的意见。
普通用词, 侧重否认意见或言论的真实性, 尤指否定他人的指控或责难。
指婉言谢绝他人的帮助或邀请等。
指坚决地拒绝接受、给予或承认。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: state that one refuses to admit the truth or existence of

examination_example.sentence: Being humble means you have the ability to accurately assess your deficiencies without <highlight>denying</highlight> your skills and strengths.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谦虚意味着你有能力准确评估自己的不足，而不否认自己的技能和优势。

examination_example.sentence: Humble people do not ignore, avoid, or try to <highlight>deny</highlight> their limits or deficiencies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谦虚的人不会忽视、逃避或试图否认自己的缺点和不足。

examination_example.sentence: Verifone, the company that makes the store's card reader would not confirm or <highlight>deny</highlight> that the plastic bag trick worked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制造该店读卡器的公司Verifone不会确认或否认塑料袋把戏奏效。

sense_info_list.en: restrain oneself especially from indulgence in pleasures
refuse to give or grant something requested or desired to someone

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>deny</highlight> our children's bids to help until they are 6 or 7 years old.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在孩子6、7岁之前，我们拒绝他们的求助。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指肯定地否认、反对或反驳某事，坚持相反的意见。
普通用词，侧重否认意见或言论的真实性，尤指否定他人的指控或责难。
指婉言谢绝他人的帮助或邀请等。
指坚决地拒绝接受、给予或承认。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 否认; 拒绝承认(某事)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
